metadata.title: CVE-2020-14315 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A memory corruption vulnerability is present in bspatch as shipped in ColinPercivalâ€™s bsdiff tools version 4.3. Insufficient checks when handlingexternal inputs allows an attacker to bypass the sanity checks in place andwrite out of a dynamically allocated buffer boundaries.

criterions.comment: bsdiff package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
